chara.textHome: Tis the season!

Even us here at the Amane Bamboo
Studio decorated our own tree,
one made of bamboo!
Morning!

I have to prepare breakfast no matter what
day it is! That's why I'm wide awake and
smiling at sunrise during the holidays, too.
Santa needs to smile, don't you think?
Want to have lunch together?

Look, I cut the cucumber into
little Christmas trees!
I hope I can make it to the party today...

Nothing good will happen if any of the
apprentices see me, so I've gotta
quietly sneak out of here...

If everyone is going to ask Santa for a wish,
I might as well make one, too...
I want to see Tsukuyo tomorrow!
The holidays are here.

Tsukuyo and I will wear
matching Santa outfits.

Going to the party with her is
going to be so much fun!

Come on, those Witches won't 
take themselves out!

Huh? You're wondering why
I'm dressed up like Santa?

Don't worry,
I'll change before the fighting starts!

So, copies in Christmas outfits are
showing up in Mirrors, too?

Well, some are in swimsuits and
Halloween costumes, so it's
hard to tell what season it is.

Oh? My outfit?
Of course, I made it myself.

I wanted mine to look just like Tsukuyo's,
so I thought up all sorts of things.
Hmm? My favorite food at holiday parties?
Probably turkey, I guess.

There's not really a chance to eat it
the rest of the year, so I always end up
going back for more.

There's a butcher in town I like to go to,
and on the way there I saw a girl I knew...
selling cake wearing a Santa costume.
I think that was Iroha Tamaki.

Doesn't the green plaid and white fur
look like a snow-covered Christmas tree?

But it's the snowmen on the belt
that are just so cute!
Hm? Am I cold?

Don't worry,
I've got heating pads all over my body.
See? Even my hands aren't cold at all.

One of my friends showed me a fanzine
drawn by this girl called "Maiden of Mortality,
Christmas Death Caribou".
It was pretty good!
*Giggle*
Mifuyu said she likes my outfit.

She's goes to Tsukuyo's school, but it almost
seems like she's looking after me too.

I won't be running into Kanagi at the party,
will I?

She helped me out in the past, but
seeing her now would be a little awkward...
Darn it... I was so close to sneaking out...
But Take heard my bells and found me...
